title: Brand Reputation Management With Todd Collins
itunes:title: Brand Reputation Management With Todd Collins
description:
Todd Collins is a brand reputation consultant and host of the Todd Collins podcast. In this interview, we go over some beginner ways to launch your personal brand, key mistakes to avoid, and what to do if you damage your reputation.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/151
 
Get More Involved:
